North_Port.New Braves Spring Training Stadium: The Atlanta Braves of Major League Baseball are planning to move to a new Spring Training stadium in Sarasota County, Florida, for the 2020 season. Their lease at Champion Stadium expires at the end of the 2019 season. The ballpark will be located in North Port, Florida in the southern part of Sarasota County, 35 miles south of Sarasota, Florida.
